name: Pirates vs monkeys
description:
In the game you have to control a combat cannon and launch various projectiles at the fortified positions of monkeys.
Destroy their positions, while destroying the monkeys themselves.In order to complete the level, you need to kill all the monkeys.
To control the gun, press the arrows on the keyboard and press the space bar to shoot.

There is a whole arsenal of fighting them at your disposal, use it correctly and you will definitely win!
